function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in the built environment leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases within the confined space, leading to higher infection rates.","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation and airflow systems are in place to reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens. Follow guidelines for external venting and airflow control to minimize the risk of indoor transmission.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, HVAC systems with proper ventilation and air exchange rates, exhaust fans with external venting.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and residents in the built environment.","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, and occupants."},{"Description":"Inadequate access to open air spaces leading to confinement-related mental health issues in isolated occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues, such as anxiety and depression, due to lack of access to open air and outdoor environments.","Mitigation":"Design and provide access to external open spaces or self-containable courtyards to allow isolating occupants safe access to the outside environment. Consider the impact of spatial design on mental well-being.","Technologies":"Architectural design features that facilitate access to outdoor spaces, such as openable windows, balconies, and self-containable courtyards.","People":"Isolating occupants and residents in the built environment.","Owner":"Architects, building designers, property developers."},{"Description":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines in communal spaces, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19, within communal spaces due to close contact and lack of social distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures in communal spaces, such as hosting social occasions with adherence to recommended inter-personal distances. Promote awareness of the importance of social distancing in minimizing the spread of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Digital crowd monitoring systems, occupancy sensors, contact tracing apps for communal spaces.","People":"Residents, visitors, and guests in communal spaces.","Owner":"Property managers, event organizers, and residents."}]}
